scripts.up: docker compose -f docker/compose.qa.yml --env-file docker/.env.example up -d --build postgres redis localstack backend
scripts.up:infra: docker compose -f docker/compose.qa.yml --env-file docker/.env.example up -d postgres redis localstack

scripts.seed: docker compose -f docker/compose.qa.yml --env-file docker/.env.example run --rm migrate-seed
